properties.description:
Detects when a user/role attempts to delete the GuardDuty detector. 
 Handling Guidance:  1) Follow the AWS Credential Leakage / Identity Compromise IR Guide wiki if you think the user/role/account is compromised. https://wiki.costargroup.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=866618934  2) Notify secops about this issue even if the actions being done were unsuccessful. 3) Identify the user performing the actions and reach out (If possible).
